ratings.question_text: What is your overall assessment of this course?

narratives.question_text: How would you summarize AFAM 505 01/AMST 643 01 for a fellow student? Would you recommend AFAM 505 01/AMST 643 01 to another student? Why or why not?
comments: I would not be too eager to recommend this class unless the student had extensive prior knowledge of the countries discussed (in terms of history, culture and politics) as well as a strong background in political science and political history, since this course requires a deep and vast knowledge of these subjects.I would summarize this course as being challenging, with rewarding dialogue, however, at times, it was confusing and difficult to follow.

The course gave me invaluable perspectives and conceptual frameworks to understand Latin America. I would certainly recommend it to another student, but would give the caveat that the workload, in terms of reading, is intense.

narratives.question_text: How did this course deepen your knowledge of your discipline/profession? To what extent did this course contribute to your dissertation/research?
comments: It contributed enormously, by introducing me to scholarship that discusses domination, resistance and state formation in Latin America.
